Package toystore.financial

Class Discount

java.lang.Object
toystore.financial.Discount
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Discount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Used to describe a discount, with a name, type (either fixed discount: "-10 RON", or percentage one: "-15% BLACK FRIDAY"), value, and date of appliance, which is initially null and later change to current date.

The class also keeps track of all discounts added so far, storing them inside a map, using a pair of discountType and value as key, since those 2 determine an unique discount, and returns a Discount object as value. The map is updated and queried using public methods since it's a private collection. The pair used to create a tuple of those 2 elements is from the org.javatuples library.

Class implements Serializable, since the singleton Store wants to serialize everything it contains.

See Also:
Serialized Form
